# UITextInlinePredictionType.no

**Case**

A constant that turns off inline text predictions.

## Declaration

```swift
case no
```

## Constants

- **UITextInlinePredictionType.default**: A constant that determines the behavior of inline text predictions according to the context.
- **UITextInlinePredictionType.yes**: A constant that turns on inline text predictions.
